name: GOTCHA YOU LITTLE FUCKER! -BOOM!-
description: GANGSTAR.WAD by GANGSTAR 05-20-94 The ultimate DEATHMATCH level! Made escpecially for DEATHMATCH mode 3-4 players, but it's fun playing 2! What a heck works fine for singel play too! Has put in lots of secret rooms and passages for you to discover! Learn all the secret rooms and passages and find the best weapon and you'll easilly kill your opponent! Maybe it's little too BIG! :) More fun that way!
